      • fileExists

        private boolean fileExists(java.lang.String filename)

      • decorateTest

        private static junit.framework.Test decorateTest()
        Add decorators to a test run. Context is established in the reverse order that decorators are declared here. That is, decorators compose in reverse order. The order of the setup methods is:
        • Copy security policy to visible location.
        • Install a security manager.
        • Run the tests.

      • suite

        public static junit.framework.Test suite()

      • decorateSystemPropertyTests

        private static BaseTestSuite decorateSystemPropertyTests(BaseTestSuite suite)

      • decorateShutdownTest

        private static junit.framework.Test decorateShutdownTest(java.lang.String testName,
                                                         java.lang.String user,
                                                         java.lang.String password)
        Decorate a test case that will attempt to shut down a network server using the supplied credentials. The network server will run with authentication enabled.
        Parameters:
        testName - name of the test case to decorate
        user - the user that should attempt to shut down the server
        password - the password to be used when shutting down the server
        Returns:
        the decorated test case
